response.original_title: The History Of Chess: A Reflection Of Us
response.overview: The entire history of chess, in one video. A documentary telling the full story of chess from it's origin in India to it's diffusion throughout the world and into the modern era. Learn about the champion's who have defined the game such as Paul Morphy, Bobby Fischer, Garry Kasparov, and Magnus Carlsen from some of the game's greatest players and commentators, including Viswanathan Anand, Bruce Pandolfini, Ben Finegold, and Danny Rensch.
response.title: The History Of Chess: A Reflection Of Us
